sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"相似，类似"之意。
means: similarity ： 指不同的人或事物在外表、特征、程度或性质等方面有某些相似之处。
resemblance ： 指外观或性质有相似之处。
analogy ： 指外表或实质均不相同的事物对比之下的类似之处。
likeness ： 普通用词，指人或物从外观看去，有很明显的相似之处，或完全相似。

sentence.Network_en: Helen is also 25 and from Birmingham, but the similarity ends there.
sentence.Network_cn: 海伦也是25岁，也来自伯明翰，但是相同之处仅此而已。

sentence.Network_en: The report highlights the similarity between the two groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 这份报告强调两组之间的相似性。

sentence.Network_en: There were points of similarity between them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们之间有某些相似之处.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... severe a. 严重的 similarity n. 相似， 类似 southeastern a. 东南部的.
一种称做相似性（similarity）的对应关系能使对应线段之长度比率保持不变。但这一性质仅适用于被考虑的特殊1-1对应。
非正式地，两个对象之间的相似度（similarity）是这两个对象相似程度的数值度量。因而，两个对象越相似，它们的相似度就越高。
高中英语必修2_百度百科 ... signal vi.& vt. 发信号 △similarity n. 相像性；相似点 △species n. 种类；物种.

list.abs: ...相似褶皱相似褶皱（similar fold）是一种典型的褶皱几何模式，组成褶皱的各褶皱面作相似的弯曲。各面的曲率相同，但没有共同的曲率中心，褶皱.
...的热点。究竟是什么使得人们把前后遇到的两个客体视为同一个个体？目前主要存在四种加工机制对此进行解释：相似理论(similarity theory)认为客体连续性建立在客体表面特征相似的基础上。时空理论(spatiotemporal theory).
心理学专业词汇英语翻译(S) ... similarity 相似性 similarity coefficient 相似系数 similarity error 相似性错误.
一流动相似必须满足三个方面的相似 1 几何相似(Geometric similarity):原型、模型的几何形状相似,所有相应长度成同一比例关系——长度比尺几何相似→所有对应角度相等.

means.word_mean: 相似,类似,同等,相当,一致

entry.def: If there is a similarity between two or more things, they are similar to each other.

example.ex: The astonishing similarity between my brother and my first-born son...
example.tran: 我弟弟和我的大儿子长得惊人地相似

example.ex: There was a very basic similarity in our philosophy...
example.tran: 我们的人生哲学在根本上很相似。

entry.tran: 相似处;相似点;类似的地方
entry.def: Similarities are features that things have which make them similar to each other.

example.ex: There were significant similarities between mother and son...
example.tran: 母子之间有很多相像的地方。

example.ex: The similarities between Mars and Earth were enough to keep alive hopes of some form of Martian life.
example.tran: 火星和地球之间的诸多相似处足以让人们对火星上存在某种生物抱以希望。

means.word_mean: 2. a Getalt principle of organization holding that (other things being equal) parts of a stimulus field that are similar to each other tend to be perceived as belonging together as a unit

auth_sentence.content: 'T cut against the relevant similarity in any way.

auth_sentence.res_content: People photographing at Times Square is very common similarity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People photographing at Times Square is very common similarity.

auth_sentence.content: They became close because of their similarity of thinking.
auth_sentence.res_content: They became close because of their similarity of thinking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They became close because of their similarity of thinking.

stems_affixes.word_buile: simil相类似,一样+ar……的→adj.[to]相似的,类似的
veri=very+similar[adj.[to]相似的,类似的]→非常相似
similar[adj.[to]相似的,类似的]+ly表副词→adv.同样地, 类似于
dis不+simil相类似,一样+ation表名词→不相同
fac事实+simil相类似,一样+e→实际一样→眷写
similar[adj.[to]相似的,类似的]+ity表名词→n.类似,相似;类似点
as不断+simil相同+ate表动词→成为相同→同化

sentences.en: There were points of similarity between them.
sentences.cn: 他们之间有某些相似之处。
